description: German officials and experts in numismatics chose three different designs for their euro coins.

coins.description: 1, 2 and 5-cent coins: the oak twig, reminiscent of that found on the former German pfennig coins, provides the motif for these coins. It was designed by Professor Rolf Lederbogen.
